title: Reversal
name: saleVoidWithAmount
description: Request a void operation on previous sale transaction, referred to by the parameter transaction. Parameters amount, currency and present must be the same as the in the sale to be voided. This operation reverts (if possible) a specific sale identified with a transaction id. Note that transactions can only be reversed within the same day as the transaction was made.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.notes: Amount of funds to charge - in the minor unit of currency (f.ex. 1000 is 10.00 GBP)

parameters.name: currency
parameters.notes: 3 letter currency code in accordance to ISO4217

parameters.name: present
parameters.notes: YES if cardholder is present - NO otherwise

elements.name: responseStatus
elements.description: Invoked while during transaction with different statuses from card reader

elements.name: responseError
elements.description: Invoked to inform when an error response happens.

elements.name: responseFinanceStatus
elements.description: Invoked when the card reader finishes processing the transaction
